Text: O̩do̩ Jotam chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; oñ i jonu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Je̩rusha, o̩ma Zedo̩k.
I la fʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa che, teju e-du kʼata-wñ Uzaya che; i muda gudu tef unyi Jihofa n. Oñ amone̩ le̩ nache e̩wñ e̩kpabie̩ alo waa.
Owñ fʼalaku unyi Jihofa, e-ate̩, ne, i laño̩ butʼaku Ofe̩l ene nana ge̩,
i ño̩ kʼewo ewo ane̩ uwo Juda, i la fʼunyi unyi oji-ma kpʼo̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩ ne efoko efoko.

I ño̩ jogu kpʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n, oñ i fʼuma du. Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n kʼajifa alu tale̩nt ogume̩lu, kpʼe̩ñwa o̩ka wit icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa kpʼe̩ñwa o̩ka barli icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa wa ñw u o̩do̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩. Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n ño̩ ko wa ñw u o̩do̩ ekeji kpʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩tam fʼukpahiu ne̩ ukpe̩ kʼi fʼo̩na o̩na-wñ ñwo̩che jo̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ku Jotam che, kpʼogu kʼi ja du kpʼo̩na o̩na du kʼi le, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ref o̩takada amonu Israe̩l kpai Juda.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ e̩jonu, i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩-fa.
Taku Jotam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid; tak Ehaz, o̩ma-wñ, je̩ koji-wñ.
